Class Reservation

  • Object
    • Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Reservation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores information about a reservation of a Restaurant. This class keeps track of the information of the date and time, table, id, status, and customer of the reservation.
    Author:
    Kenrick
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Customer customer
      Customer that made this Reservation.
      private Calendar dateTime
      Date and time of this Reservation, stored in Calendar data structure
      private int id
      Identifier (id) of this Reservation, should be unique positive integer, handled by ReservationManager
      private String status
      Status of this reservation: Active: Reservation has been successfully made Checked-in: Customer of the reserved table has made an Order (i.e.
      private Table table
      Table object that is associated with this Reservation

    • Field Detail

      • dateTime

        private Calendar dateTime
        Date and time of this Reservation, stored in Calendar data structure

      • table

        private Table table
        Table object that is associated with this Reservation

      • id

        private int id
        Identifier (id) of this Reservation, should be unique positive integer, handled by ReservationManager

      • status

        private String status
        Status of this reservation:
      • Active: Reservation has been successfully made
      • Checked-in: Customer of the reserved table has made an Order (i.e. active order).
      • Cancelled: Reservation has been cancelled by customer
      • Finished: Customer of the reserved table has closed the Order.
      • Expired: Customer of the reserved table has not made any order within the BUFFER_TIME from the specified dateTime
See Also:
Order.status

  • customer

    private Customer customer
    Customer that made this Reservation.

  • Constructor Detail

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Calendar dateTime,
           Table table,
           int id,
           Customer customer)
      Constructs the Reservation with specified dateTime, table, id, and customer. By default, reservation initially will be "active".
      Parameters:
      dateTime - Calendar object specifying date and time of the reservation, not date and time when it is made.
      table - Table that is allocated to this reservation.
      id - Identified of the reservation, should be unique positive integer.
      customer - Customer object that made the reservation.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the status of the reservation. If new status is "expired", "cancelled", or "finished" then releases the Table (sets its avaiability to be true).
      Parameters:
      status - new status of the reservation

    • getTable
